Vocab Challenge


Guess The Letter
You guessed


ANSWER EXIT

Rules:

  • You have to guess a word letter by letter.

  • Total numbers of hypen is the length of the word.

  • Guess a letter, Every correct guess will cause that letter to appear in its correct position by replacing 1 or more hyphens.

  • Warning will be shown for every incorrect guesses. If the number of incorrect guesses reaches 5, the game is lost.

  • You can reveal the answer by click the answer button but atleast try once if you are a true gamer 🐼.
